title: Murmur.Day1.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_silent>>
Morning Murmur

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_talking>>
Hey Emma

title: Murmur.Day1.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_talking>>
What's on your mind Emma?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_silent>>
Despair, mainly
Hopelessness
Boredom too?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_talking>>
Yeah i feel pretty bored
Bored and terrified

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_silent>>
yeah

title: Murmur.Dialog.Resolve
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_talking>>
Is there something else you want to talk about?
<<if $escape_active is true>>
[[Yeah I'm trying to escape|Murmur.AddToEscapeQuest]]
<<endif>>
[[Not really...|Murmur.EndDialog]]

title: Murmur.Day2.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_silent>>
Hello Murmur

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_talking>>
Hello Emma
Are we gonna get a bunch of crystal today?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_silent>>
I guess we are

title: Murmur.Day2.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_talking>>
Hey emma
if you don't mind me asking, how did you end up...
uhh...enslaved?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_silent>>
No it's fine
I was on a farm on some bank owned land
and, uh, well we didn't have a good harvest

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_talking>>
That's terrible, I'm sorry

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_silent>>
yeah!

title: Murmur.Day8.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_silent>>
Hey Murmur
How do you keep going? 
You seem so unflappable

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_talking>>
Honestly? I just stopped caring about everything
stopped caring if I had a future, if I had any quality of life
it's amazing what you can endure when you don't care

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_silent>>
wait really?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_talking>>
No, I'm barely holding it together
If I stop and think about anything I start to despair
Even then sometimes, it's uncontrollable

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_silent>>
so what should I do?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_talking>>
I dunno, sleep through it like I do.
[[....|Murmur.Dialog.Resolve]]

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_silent>>

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_talking>>

[[....|Murmur.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Murmur.Day10.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_silent>>
Hey murmur, how'd you get your name?
I've been meaning to ask but I guess I hadn't yet

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_talking>>
oh my name?
One day i just decided to call myself this

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_silent>>
really? there's no tragic backstory behind it?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_talking>>
nah not really

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer murmur_default_silent>>
oh

[[....|Murmur.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Murmur.AddToEscapeQuest
body:
<<addNPCToEscape CampAreaSecretEscape Murmur>>
Escape? Here? You have a plan?
I'll help you, whatever it takes
